messages.ssml: <speak>In response to <sub alias="covid 19">COVID-19</sub>, the World Health Organization recommends we channel our concerns into action to protect ourselves, our loved ones, and our communities. First, regular and thorough hand-washing and good respiratory hygiene upkeep is important. Second, keep informed and follow the advice of local health authorities. Please visit the WHO website for more guidance.</speak>
